salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Counselor/Associate) to LKR 400,000+ (Senior Clinical Psychologist in private practice) per month.
futureOutlook: Awareness of mental health is rapidly growing in Sri Lanka, leading to increased demand for qualified psychologists and counselors in schools, corporations, and private practice. Specializations in child psychology, corporate counseling, and trauma therapy are emerging as key areas of need.
